feature <- read.table("./Features.txt",header=T)
feature$Feature <- factor(feature$Feature, levels = rev(c("Promoter", "Exon", "Intron","TE", "Intergenic")))
ggplot(feature, aes(y=Count, x=Type, fill=Feature)) + geom_bar(position = "fill", stat = "identity",width=0.6) + geom_text(aes(label = Count), position = position_fill(vjust = 0.5)) + scale_fill_manual(values=rev(c("#53B3E9","#E39500","#868686","#CD534C","#CC79A7"))) + ylab("Pct") + xlab("DMR") + theme_bw()
